dct_title_s: Magni Ducatus Lithuaniae, caeterarumque regionum illi adiacentium exacta descriptio
dct_alternative_sm: Magni Dvcatvs Lithvaniae, caeterarvmqve regionvm illi adiacentivm exacta descriptio
dct_description_sm: 3 bar scales on map, given in "Milliaria magna," "Milliaria mediocria," "Milliaria communia sive usitata."
Decorative cartouches, coat of arms, compass rose, ships.
Pictorial vignette with horsemen, bottom right.
One of the earliest maps published by Blaeu, who did not incorporate this map into an atlas until 1631.
Appears in Blaeu's Atlantis appendix, Amsterdam, 1631.
dct_publisher_sm: excudebat Guilhelmus Janssonius sub signo Solarii deaurati
